# abbey_grant_kit (Resource)

GrantKit Resource

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "abbey_grant_kit" "my_grantkit" {
  description = "...my_description..."
  name        = "Terrence Rau"
  output = {
    append    = "...my_append..."
    location  = "...my_location..."
    overwrite = "...my_overwrite..."
  }
}
```
